All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseEvent
Base class in pattern Decorator.
Bot
Class that represent a player controlled by the CPU
BotTurnEvent
Internal event thrown when the current player is a bot
BotTurnHandler
Internal event handler that handles all the possible consecutive bot turns
Card
Class that defines a card
CardListUtils
Class containing all static method used to manipulate lists of cards
ChangeBotDifficultyEvent
Event that notifies a host of a bot difficulty change
ChangeBotDifficultyHandler
 
Client
Singleton class that contains all fundamental methods to handle a client
ClientDisconnectedEvent
Internal event thrown when a client suddenly disconnects from the server
ClientDisconnectedHandler
Handles a ClientDisconnectedEvent by closing passed connection and by
ClientEventListener
 
Connection
Class that handles a Connection between two hosts at socket level
ConnectionEvent
Event that requires a connection.
ContinueGameEvent
Event used by client at the end of a round to ask the server to start a new round
ContinueGameHandler
 
Dealer
Factory class that generates all cards and generates all Player's hands
Difficulties
Enum containing all bot difficulties
Difficulty
Abstract class representing a bot difficulty.
EasyDifficulty
Class representing the easy difficulty of the bot.
EndGameController
 
EndGameEvent
Internal event triggered when the model notifies the game controller that the game is ending
EndGameException
Exception thrown when the model reaches the end of a round
EndGameHandler
 
EndGameResult
Enum that contains all possible end game results
EndGameResultsEvent
Class that represents a game result.
EndGameResultsHandler
 
Event
Class that represents an event that occurs inside the Client or the Server: it contains all data necessary to handle it.
EventHandler
Interface that represent an EventHandler, that is a class that can cause updates in the system following the occurring of an Event.
EventListener
Abstract class that listens for a connection and adds every Event that arrives to the passedQueue
EventReceiver
Class that receives the Events from the socket through a Queue and sort them to the appropriate EventHandler.
EventTransmitter
Class that allows to send an Event through a Connection in various ways
Game
Class that represents the model of a game
GameController
Class used to control the game by manipulating the model.
GameInfo
 
GameResult
Class representing a team game result.
GameResumeEvent
Event used by the server to notify the clients that a new round is started
GameResumeHandler
 
GameResumingWarningEvent
Event used by the server to warn the clients that a new round is starting
GameResumingWarningHandler
 
GroupCardTransition
 
HandChangedEvent
Event used by the server to notify a client that his hand is changed
HandChangedHandler
 
HardDifficulty
Class representing the medium difficulty of the bot.
IllegalCardConstructionException
Exception thrown when a built card does not exist
InGameController
 
JoinGameEvent
Class Event that represent a Client joining a game.
JoinGameHandler
Handles a JoinGameEvent by assigning given username to corresponding connection trying to add a new Player inside Game object return to the client the response to his join request
JoinGameResponseEvent
Event sent by the server to notify the client about the status of his joining request
JoinGameResponseHandler
 
JoinOnGoingGameEvent
Event thrown when a Client wants to join the game by replacing a bot
JoinOnGoingGameHandler
Handler that tries to connect a player knowing that a bot was playing.
ListofCardsComparator
Implementation of comparator to compare two list of cards.
Main
Software entry point
MaxPlayersReachedException
Exception thrown when trying to add a player to an already full game
MediumDifficulty
Class representing the medium difficulty of the bot.
MenuController
 
NetworkListener
Class that is used by the Server to listen for incoming connections
NewTurnEvent
Event used by the server to notify all client that a new turn has begun
NewTurnEventHandler
 
NonexistentPlayerException
Exception thrown when a non-existent player is searched
OfflineGameController
 
OnlineGameController
Game controller children class used to control a multiplayer game
OnlineLobbyController
Class that controls the interactive elements in the onlineLobby scene and the reception of a JoinGameResponseEvent
OptionsController
 
PingEvent
 
PingHandler
Client side handler used to handle the reception of a PingEvent by sending a PongEvent back
PingSender
Timer task that sends a PingEvent to passed connection
PlaceCardEvent
Event that represent a player placing a card on the table
PlaceCardHandler
Places card on table and notifies all clients, sends the new hand to current player and advances turn.
Player
Class representing a player inside the game
PlayerIterator
Iterator used to manage player turns
PlayerView
Class that represent a small Client model serving as a buffer to store information received from the server
Points
Enum that contains all possible points achievable by a team excluding scopa points
PointsCalculator
Class that contains all methods necessary to calculate end game results
PongEvent
Event that represent a PONG in the ping pong routine
PongHandler
Event handler that handles a Pong Event by resetting the counter of the connection that sent it
ReplaceWithBotEvent
 
ReplaceWithBotHandler
 
RequestGameInfoEvent
Event used to request any kind of game information to the server.
RequestGameInfoHandler
Handler that sends different events according to queried information
Response
Enum that contains all possible server response to a client trying to connect
SceneLoader
Class that contains all static method to set and swap stages
ScoreEvent
Event used by the server to send the team points and the team names.
ScoreEventHandler
 
Server
Singleton class that contains all fundamental methods to handle a server
ServerApp
Server entry point
ServerEventListener
 
StartGameClientHandler
 
StartGameEvent
Event used by the server to notify the clients that are waiting that the game is starting.
StartGameServerHandler
 
Suit
Enum containing all possible cards suit
Table
Class representing the game table.
TableChangedEvent
Event that contains the new state of the table that must be displayed
TableChangedHandler
 
TablePlacementTransition
 
TakeCardTransition
Transition wrapper class that, given an ImageView, animates it as if it was taken e.g. it rotates it by showing the back
Team
Class that represents a team.
UnexpectedDisconnection
 
UpdatePlayerCountEvent
Event used by the sever to notify all clients that the number of clients in the waiting room is changed
UpdatePlayerCountHandler
 
UsernameChangedEvent
 
UsernameChangedHandler
 
UsernameTakenException
Exception thrown when trying to add a player with a username already present
View
Entry point of the client
ViewController
 
WaitingRoomController
